name: color-palette-extractor
title: Color Palette Extractor
description: Extract dominant colors from images and create visual palettes
content:
Overview

This application extracts the dominant colors from an image and creates a visual color palette. Built using Pillow and ColorThief, it identifies the most prominent colors and generates both visual and text-based outputs.

Features

  • Extract 6 dominant colors from any image
  • Creates visual palette with color swatches
  • Provides RGB and hex color codes
  • Generates text file with color data
  • High-quality color analysis

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates two files:

  • [filename]_palette_6_colors.png - Visual palette with color swatches
  • [filename]_palette_6_colors.txt - Text file with RGB and hex values

Use Cases

  • Web design color scheme creation
  • Brand color extraction from logos
  • Creating color palettes for artwork
  • Matching colors for design projects
  • Analyzing photo color compositions
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$(date +%s%N)"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/color_palette_extractor.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -n 6
